nodes.text: Mission to the Dark Heart  (Hero of Tython)

During the mission to stop the Sith Lord Fulminiss from unleashing a plague of madness across the planet Voss, the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython undertook a mission to the Dark Heart to confront Fulminiss alongside the Voss Commando Tala-Reh and rescue the Mystic Valen-Da.
